name: Grglmrgl
rules: 8 -> Flip Grglmrgl;You pay 8 less to flip Grglmrgl if an opposing hero was dealt 8 or more damage this turn.;BACK: Monsters allies you control have Ferocity.;;Deckbuilding: You can't put [Horde] or [Alliance] cards in your deck.
flavour: Aaaaaughibbrgubugbugrguburgle.

name: Lady Sira'kess
rules: FRONT: 8 -> Flip Flip Sira'kess;You pay 8 less to flip Sira'kess if you played three or more Frost and/or [Frost] cards this turn.;BACK: [Exhaust]->Sira'kess deals 1 frost damage to target hero or ally.;2-> Exhaust target hero or ally that was dealt frost ([Frost]) damage this turn.;;Deckbuilding: You can't put [Horde] or [Alliance] cards in your deck.
flavour: I am the Mistressss of the Tidesss! You dare challenge me in this placcce?

name: Rawrbrgle
rules: 8 -> Flip Flip Rawrbrgle;You pay 8 less to flip Rawrbrgle if you control five or more Murloc allies.;BACK: Monster allies you control have +1/+1.;;Deckbuilding: You can't put [Horde] or [Alliance] cards in your deck.
flavour: RwlRwlRwlRwl!

name: Boundless Shadows
rules: Eternal (When this enters your graveyard from anywhere, you may shuffle it into your deck.);Target player removes a card from the top of his deck from the game for each resource you control.
flavour: Your mind will be forever lost in darkness. - High Priestess Neeri

name: Psychic Screech
rules: Put target ally into its owner's hand.;Delve (Look at the top two cards of your deck. Put any number of them on top of your deck in any order, and the rest on the bottom.)

name: Monstrous Upheaval
rules: Your hero deals 2 melee damage to target hero or ally for each Monster hero and ally you control.

name: Dulvar, Hand of the Light
rules: Prevent all damage attackers would deal to this ally. ;When this ally deals damage to an opposing hero, he heals that much damage from your hero.
flavour: I bring the word of the Light. You would do well to listen.

name: Faithseer Jasmina
rules: If this ally would be dealt non-fatal damage, prevent it. ;When you play an ability, ally, or equipment, you may put a +1 / +1 counter on this ally.

name: Mekkatorque, King of the Gnomes
rules: At the start of your turn, you may put target equipment from any graveyard into play under your control.;Mekkatorque has +2 / +2 for each equipment you control.
flavour: Once again, Gnomeregan will be our home!

name: Shanla, Herald of Faith
rules: Empower Priest: When this ally enters play, if you control another Priest hero or ally, destroy target opposing ability and all other opposing abilities with the same name as it.
flavour: Elune will protect her children in this time of chaos.

name: Alana the Woebringer
rules: At the start of your turn, remove the top half of target opponent's deck from the game, rounded up.
flavour: Woe to those who stand in defiance of the Banshee Quenn.

name: Baxtan, Herald of the Flame
rules: Empower Mage: When this ally enters play, if you control another Mage hero or ally, this ally deals 3 fire damage divided as you choose to any number of target heroes and/or allies.

name: Lordann the Bloodreaver
rules: Protector;This ally has +3 / +3 while your hero has 15 or more damage.
flavour: I smell blood in the water.

name: Mazu'kon
rules: Ferocity; When this ally is destroyed, put a 6 [Nature] / 6 [Health] Troll Shaman ally token named Mazu'kon into play with Ferocity.

name: Gilblin Deathscrounger
rules: This ally can attack only heroes.;At the start of your turn, if this ally is in your graveyard, you may remove another Monster ally in your graveyard from the game. If you do, put this ally into play.

name: Bubblegil
rules: This and other Murloc allies you control have Protector. (They may exhaust to become the defender when an opposing hero or ally attacks.)
flavour: Lmmmlgml Mmgrrrmrm Lmrrlrmm Mrlmgmgg lgmlmm Lgrrlmm.

name: Chumly
rules: This and other Murloc allies you control have +1 / +1.
flavour: Rr MGG Ggmmmlmrmgmg!

name: Crabbyfin
rules: When this or another Murloc ally enters play under your control, you may put a 1 [Melee] / 1 [Health] Crab Monster ally token into play.
flavour: Rr mgg Rlrrglmg gmmr lgmlmm Lrmmm.

name: Gobbler
rules: When Gobbler attacks, you may search your deck for a Murloc, reveal it, and put it into your hand.;When Gobbler or another Murloc ally you control is destroyed, each opponent chooses and destroys an ally he controls.

name: Murloc Coastrunner
flavour: Mlmmlmmm Ggmggmmlr Lgmlmm Lrmmgmlmgg!

name: Nibbler
rules: When this or another Murloc ally enters play under your control, it deals 1 melee damage to target opposing hero.
flavour: Rmmmlg Rr'gg Glgmlg Mllmmmmggmgl.

name: Swarmtooth
rules: When this or another Murloc ally enters play under your control, you may reveal the top card of your deck. If it's a Murloc, put it into your hand.
flavour: Rr MGG Ggmmmkmrmgmg!

name: Buldrug
rules: Enrage (As this ally enters play, you may reveal the top card of your deck.);When you reveal an ally this way, this ally has +2 ATK and Ferocity this turn.
flavour: Me gonna crush your bones.

name: Neph'Lahim
rules: Smash (If this ally would deal more than fatal damage to a defending ally, it deals the rest to that ally's controller's hero.)Other Orge heroes and allies you control have Assault 2 and Smash.

name: Tar'gak the Felcrazed
rules: You pay 1 less to play this ally for each Monster hero and ally you control.

name: Thrug the Hurler
rules: Empower Monster: When this ally enters play, if you control another Monster hero or ally, this ally deals 4 melee damage to target hero or ally.
flavour: You go fly now!

name: Commander Ulthok
rules: Monster Hero Required; When Ulthok enters play, name an ability, ally, or equipment. Then, search target opponent's deck, graveyard, and hand for all cards with that name and remove them from the game.
flavour: Lilth vwah, uhn'agth fhssh za.

name: Faceless Sapper
rules: Enrage (As this ally enters play, you may reveal the top card of your deck.);When you reveal an ally this way, this ally has +2 ATK and Ferocity this turn.

name: Mindbender Ghur'sha
rules: While you control one or more other Monster heroes and/or allies, Ghur'sha has Ferocity.;While you control two or more other Monster heroes and/or allies, Ghur'sha has Assault 4.;While you control three or more other Monster heroes and/or allies, Ghur'sha has Invincible.
flavour: Is. This. Reality?

name: Idra'kess Enchantress
rules: [Exhaust] Destroy this and two other allies you control -> Search your hand and/or deck for a card named Ozumat and put it into play.

name: Ozumat
rules: Ferocity, Eternal (When this enters your graveyard from anywhere, you may shuffle it into your deck.);When Ozumat becomes targeted by an opposing card of effect, he deals 10 shadow damage to that opponent's hero.

name: Kolorath
rules: When Kolorath enters play, put all non-[Frost] allies into their owners' hands.
flavour: A mighty Kraken that patrols the dark waters of the Abyssal Depths.

name: Concussive Barrage
rules: Marksmanship Talent(You can't put Beast Mastery Talents or Survival Talents in your deck.);Your hero deals 2 ranged damage to target hero or ally. That damage is doubled for each other card named Concussive Barrage in your graveyard.

name: Erunak Stonespeaker
rules: When Erunak enters play, put a 0 [Melee] / 2 [Health] Air, Earth, Fire, or Water Totem token into play.;Exhaust a Totem you control ->;Air: Ready Erunak.;Earth: Erunak has Protector this turn.;Fire: Erunak has +5 ATK this turn.;Water: Erunak heals 5 damage from himself.(received errata)

name: Toshe Chaosrender
rules: Opponents can't complete quests.;You can complete opposing quests. (You get the rewards.);Toshe has +1 / +1 for each opposing face-down resource.
flavour: Ready for a little vengeance?

name: Bottled Life
rules: When this item enters play, put a 1 [Melee] / 1 [Health] Treant ally token into play.;On your turn: Exhaust a Druid hero or ally you control and destroy this item -> Put a 1 [Melee] / 1 [Health] Treant ally token into play.

name: Sorrow's End
rules: Play with the top card of your deck revealed.;While a card with cost 3 or more is revealed this way, this weapon has +3 ATK.;While a card with cost 3 or less is revealed this way, you pay 3 less to strike with this weapon.

name: Surge of Power
rules: Ongoing: Token allies you control have +1/+1
flavour: This could get ugly... - Tinker Priest Cassie

name: Fungal Growth
rules: Balance Talent(You can't put Feral Talents or Restoration Talents in your deck.);Ongoing:At the end of your turn, you may put a 5[Melee]/5[Health] Fungal Behemoth ally token into play if you control five or more allies. Otherwise, you may put a 1 [Melee]/1 [Health] Treant ally token into play.

name: Laetho Moonbranch
rules: When this ally enters play, you may put a 1 [Melee]/1 [Health] Treant ally token into play.
flavour: Cenarius had blessed me with a gift of nature.

name: Soul Swap
rules: Affliction Talent(You can't put Demonology Talents or Destruction Talents in your deck.); Your hero deals shadow damage to target hero equals to half of it's remaining health, rounded up, and heals 1 damage from itself for each damage dealt this way.

name: Spark of Life
rules: Restoration Talent(You can't put Elemental Talents or Enhancement Talents into your deck.);Put target ally from your graveyard into play if it costs less than or equal to the number of resources you control. If you do, attach this ability to it.;Ongoing: Attached ally has: When this ally attacks for the first time each turn, ready it.; When this ability leaves play, destroy attached ally.

name: Vendetta
rules: Assassination Talent(You can't put Combat Talents or Subtelty Talents in your deck.);Destroy target exhausted ally, or gain control of it if you have no card in your hand.

name: Chakra
rules: Holy Talent(You can't put Discipline Talent or Shadow Talents in your deck.);Ongoing: If your hero or an ally you control would deal damage, it deals that much +1 instead.;If your hero or an ally you control would heal damage, it heals that much +1 instead.

name: Grand Crusader
rules: Protection Talent(You can't put Holy Talents or Retribution Talents in your deck.);Ongoing: Allies you control with cost 2 or less have +2/+2

name: Brittle Bones
rules: Frost Talent(You can't put Blood Talents or Unholy Talents in your deck.);Attach to opposing hero.;Ongoing:At the start of your turn, your hero deals 2 frost damages to attached hero. Then, if attached heros has 15 or more damage, destroy this ability. When you do, destroy two target non-hero cards.

name: Boundless Wild
rules: EternalWhen this enters your graveyard from anywhere, you may shuffle it into your deck.);For each resource you control, put a 1[Melee]/1[Health] Treant ally token into play.
flavour: Da wilds of nature know no bounds! - Fama'sin the Lifeseer

name: Char
rules: Attach to target hero.;Ongoing:At the start of your turn, your hero deals 1 fire damage to attached hero for each card in it's controller's hand.

name: Kieron the Loaner
rules: When this ally enters play, each opponent draws 3 cards;At the end of each turn, if an opponent has no card in his hands, destroy his hero.
flavour: How much do you value your life?

name: Faceless Watcher
rules: Play this ally only if you control three or more Monster Heroes and/or allies.

name: Kinza, Mistress of the Elements
rules: When you play a non-ongoing ability, you may pay 2. If you do, copy that ability. (You may choose new targets for the copy)

name: Bloodsurge
rules: Fury Talent(You can't put Arms Talents or Protection Talents in your deck.);Ongoing: If a hero would deal damage, it deals double that much instead.
flavour: I can do this all day. Can you? - Jak the Bilgewater Bruiser

name: Gnash
rules: When Gnash enters play, destroy all allies with cost 3 or less.
flavour: Tiny little things, leave Gnash alone!

name: Throne of the Tides
rules: 1, [Exhaust] -> Delve(Look at the top two cards of your deck. Put any number of them on top of your deck in any order, and the rest on the bottom.)
flavour: Neptulon the Tidehunter rules his domain from the Throne of the Tides

name: Lady Naz'jar
rules: 3, Exhaust two Naga heroes and/or allies you control -> Naz'jar deals 5 frost damage to target hero or ally. A character dealt damage this way can't attack or exhaust this turn.
flavour: You have interfered with our plans for the last time, mortals!

name: Skullchewer
rules: As this ally enters play, you may remove an ally in an opposing graveyard from the game. If you do, this ally has that card's printed powers.
flavour: Go forth and find that which I seek! - Deathbringer Kor'ush

name: Barathex, Undeath's Hand
rules: 6, Flip Barathex -> Put target ally from an opposing graveyard into play under your control. If you do, that ally also has Ferocity, This ally can attack only heroes, and At end of turn, destroy this ally.;(received errata)
flavour: With each passing day, the screams of the dead get louder and louder, each begging for even a moment of freedom from the eternal darkness.

name: Joleera
rules: On your turn: 2, flip Joleera -> Joleera has +2 ATK this turn.
flavour: To archive apotheosis, we who walk in the shadows must force our blades to bring the silence of death.

name: Augment Steel
rules: Put target equipment from your graveyard into play if its cost is less then or equal to the number of resources you control. It enters play with three +1 ATK counters if it's a weapon, or three +1 [DEF] if it's an armor.
flavour: One goblin's trash is another goblin's treasure. - Jak the Bilgewater Bruiser

name: Deatheater Stroud
rules: When damage is healed from an opposing ally, this ally deals that much shadow damage to that ally's controller's hero.
flavour: The longer you stay alive, the more I can torture your soul.

name: Neptulon
rules: Fire Resistance;When your hero becomes Neptulon, reveal the top ten cards of your deck. Remove all revealed Frost and [Frost] cards from the game, and put the rest on the bottom of your deck.;Tidal Surge: Allies you control have +1/+1 for each card removed this way.
flavour: Witness the power of pure water!

name: Bestial Revival
rules: Ongoing: When this ability enters play, put target Pet from your graveyard into play if its cost is less then or equal to the number of resources you control.;You can control an additional Pet.

name: Focus Magic
rules: Arcane Talent (You can't put Fire Talents or Frost Talents in your deck.);Reveal the top card of your deck and put it into your hand. Then, search your deck for up to three cards with the same name as the revealed card, reveal them, and put them into your hand.

name: Boundless Might
rules: Eternal (When this enters your graveyard from anywhere, you may shuffle it into your deck.);Choose one: Target weapon has +1 ATK this turn for each resource you control, or target armor has +1 [DEF] this turn for each resource you control.
flavour: The tools may change, but the Light remains the same. - Anaka the Light's Bulwark

name: Poison Bomb
rules: Your hero deals 3 nature damage to each opposing hero and ally.;Ongoing: This ability enters play with three gas counters on it.;At the start of your turn, remove a gas counter from this ability. If you do, your hero deals 1 nature damage to each opposing hero and ally. Then, if no gas counters remain, destroy this ability.

name: Earthen Might
rules: Your hero heals 3 damage from target hero or ally. Then, if that character is undamaged, it also has +3 ATK this turn.
flavour: The strength of the earth itself will bolster your attacks. - Samaku, Hand of the Tempest

name: Hellisa
rules: When this ally enters play, you may exhaust target ready opposing ally. If you do, that ally deals shadow damage equal to its ATK to its controller's hero.
flavour: Say please.

name: Vandos, Herald of War
rules: Empower Warrior: When this ally enters play, if you control another Warrior hero or ally, reveal the top five cards of your deck. Put all revealed equipment into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your deck.
flavour: Prepare accordingly, then grant them no mercy.

name: Abyssal Seahorse
rules: 1, [Exhaust] -> Reveal the top card of your deck. if it's a quest or location, place it into your resource row exhausted as an additional resource.;(Mounts can't attack or be attacked.)
flavour: If you're going to make it anywhere in this kelp forest, we need to get you a reliable mount. - Moanah Stormhoof

name: Big Cauldron of Battle
rules: At the start of your turn, choose one at random: Pain, Mind, Cunning, Power, or Time.;Pain: Your hero deals 1 arcane damage to itself.;Mind: Draw a card.;Cunning: Each opponent discard a card.;Power: Your hero deals 3 melee damage to each opposing hero and ally.;Time: Repeat this process two more times.

name: RwlRwlRwlRwl!
rules: Murloc allies you control have +1 ATK and Ferocity this turn. (They can attack immediately.)

name: Nespirah
rules: If Nespirah would deal damage to an opposing hero, she deals that much divided as you choose among any number of opposing heroes and/or allies instead.
flavour: You know as well as I do the dangers poser by any angry demigod. - Erunak Stonespeaker

name: Unstable Corruption
rules: When this ally deals combat damage to an opposing hero, you may put a token copy of this ally into play exhausted.
flavour: Ozumat's vile corruption can taint even the purest of waters. - Erunak Stonespeaker

name: Revenant of Neptulon
rules: When you play a Frost or [Frost] card, this ally may deal 2 frost damage to target hero or ally.

name: Anaka the Light's Bulwark
rules: On your turn: 4, Flip Anaka -> Target hero or ally you control has Invincible this turn. (It can't leave play, be targeted, or be dealt damage.)
flavour: There is no better time than now to trust in the Light.

name: High Magus Olvek
rules: 1, Flip Olvek -> Choose ability, ally, or equipment, then reveal the top card of your deck. If it has the chosen type, put it into your hand.
flavour: Can ye master each school of magic, lad? Push yerself to yer limits, and let's see how ye do.

name: Janvaru the Thunderspeaker
rules: 4, Flip Janvaru -> Choose one: Janvaru deals 4 nature damage to target hero, or Janvaru heals 4 damage from himself.
flavour: Be one with the storm. It can be gentle and provide cleansing rains, or it can bring destruction and chaos.

name: Master Sniper Simon McKey
rules: On your turn: 2, Flip Simon -> Simon deals ranged damage to target hero or ally equal to the ATK of a Pet you control.
flavour: Watch closely and see how it's done, cuz I ain't gonna sit here all day.

name: Sana the Black Blade
rules: On your turn: 3, Flip Sana -> Sana deals 3 melee damage to target exhausted hero or ally.
flavour: Clearly, the best option is for you to be the bait, but don't you worry - I'll kill him before he kills you.

name: Skodis the Nethertwister
rules: 5, Flip Skodis -> Skodis deals 3 shadow damage to target hero or ally and heals 1 damage from himself for each damage dealt this way.
flavour: Your soul has only two choices: go willingly and painlessly, or be ripped from your body excruciatingly.

name: Steelguard Adamson
rules: 3, Flip Adamson -> Choose one: Add a +1 ATK counter to target weapon, or add a +1 [DEF] counter to target armor.
flavour: Your bravery is quite commendable, but I can smell the fear covering every fiber of your being.

name: Tinker Priest Cassie
rules: On your turn: 5, Flip Cassie -> Target opponent chooses an ability, ally and equipment he controls. Put each of them into its owner's hand.
flavour: Healing and tinkering have quite a lot in common, you know.

name: Wildseer Varel
rules: On your turn: 4, Flip Varel -> Search your deck for an attachment, reveal it, and put it into your hand.
flavour: There is much to repair in the wake of the Shattering, both physical and spiritual.

name: Drazul the Molten
rules: 3, Flip drazul -> Drazul deals 4 fire damage to target hero or ally that was deald damage this turn.
flavour: Your foolish attempts to stand against the might of the Horde will soon be burned to ash.

name: Fama'sin the Lifeseer
rules: On your turn: 5, Flip Fama'sin -> Put three 1 [Melee] / 1 [Health] Treant ally tokens into play.
flavour: Da forces of nature, dey be itchin' to stand up and fight, mon.

name: Gaxtro, Bilgewater Marksman
rules: If Gaxtro is defending: 2, Flip Gaxtro -> Remove target attacker from combat, and Gaxtro deals 1 ranged damage to it.
flavour: Put your money where your mouth is and try your luck.

name: Ghoulmaster Kalisa
rules: On your turn: 2, Discard an ally, flip Kalisa -> Put a 3 [Melee] / 3 [Health] Ghoul ally token into play.
flavour: Souls of the damned, lost in the darkness... your master beckons.

name: High Priestess Neeri
rules: 3, Flip Neeri -> Remove the top three cards of target opponent's deck from the game. Neeri heals 2 damage from herself for each ally removed this way.
flavour: Most goblins will choose the path that they think offers the greatest advantage. I guess I've found a way to harness the advantages of both the Light and the shadows.

name: Jak the Bilgewater Bruiser
rules: On your turn: 4, Flip Jak -> Ready Jak and target weapon you control. You pay 4 less to strike with it this turn.
flavour: Don't test my patience, unless you enjoy getting your face broken.

name: Rohashu, Zealot of the Sun
rules: 4, Flip Rohashu -> Rohashu deals 3 unpreventable holy damage to target hero or ally.
flavour: The light of the sun gives life to all of Azeroth. Take this gift for granted, and I will unleash the sun's fury like nothing you have ever witnessed.

name: Samaku, Hand of the Tempest
rules: 1, Flip Samaku -> Delve (Look at the top two cards of your deck. Put any number of them on top of your deck in any order, and the rest on the bottom.)
flavour: I remember when the storms filled my heart with fear. My devotion to the understanding of their fury has enlightened me more than I could ever have imagined.

name: Voidbringer Jindal'an
rules: X, Flip Jindal'an -> Reveal the top X cards of your deck. Put a revealed Demon into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your deck.
flavour: Peer into da abyss, mon. Joo see what I see?

name: Deathbringer Kor'ush
rules: 8 -> Flip Kor'ush;You pay 8 less to flip Kor'ush if an ally you controlled with 6 or more ATK was destroyed this turn.;BACK: At the start of your turn, you may pay 3 and remove target ally in an opposing graveyard from the game. If you do, put a 3 [Melee] / 3 [Health] Ghoul ally into play under your control.;;Deckuilding: You can't put [Horde] or [Alliance] cards in your deck.
flavour: I know it's here somewhere. I can feel its presence. The naga have left behind enough corpses to raise an army and find it.

name: Claws of the Dead
rules: Opposing allies have -3 ATK this turn.;Delve (Look at the top two cards of your deck. Put any number of them on top of your deck in any order, and the rest on the bottom.)

name: Death's Duo
rules: Remove two target allies in an opposing graveyard from the game. If you do, put two 3 [Melee] / [Health] Ghoul ally tokens into play.
flavour: This sunken city is rife with corpses longing to serve me. - Deathbringer Kor'ush

name: Infestation
rules: Attach to target opposing hero.;Ongoing: At the start of your turn, your hero deals 1 shadow damage to attached hero. Then, if attached hero has 15 or more damage, destroy this ability. When you do, put two 3 [Melee] / 3[Health] Ghoul ally tokens into play.

name: Monstrous Essence
rules: Ongoing: When a Monster ally you control is destroyed, your hero deals shadow damage to target hero equal to that ally's ATK and heals damage from itself equal to that ally's [Health].

name: Plagued Mind
rules: Attach to target hero.;Ongoing: When attached hero's controller draws a card, your hero deals 1 shadow damage to attached hero.
flavour: With each thought, your mind is one step closer to oblivion. - Barathex, Undeath's Hand

name: Mark of Goldrinn
rules: Attach to target ally.;Ongoing: Attached ally has +5 / +5.
flavour: Can you feel the spirit of Goldrinn flowing within your veins? - Wildseer Varel

name: Stalwart Bear Form
rules: Target up to two opposing allies. Your hero deals 2 melee damage to each of them.;Ongoing: Your hero has Protector and +5 [Health].
flavour: Adapt to each changing situation that presents itself. - Wildseer Varel

name: Verdant Boon
rules: Put a 1 [Melee] / 1 [Health] Treant ally token into play, or three if you control an ally token.
flavour: Great tree spirits, we require your aid! - Fama'sin the Lifeseer

name: Wild Roots
rules: Attach to target ally and exhaust it, then Delve. (Look at the top two cards of your deck. Put any number of them on top of your deck in any order, and the rest on the bottom.);Ongoing: Attached ally can't ready.

name: Chompers
rules: Once per turn, on your turn: Destroy a Murloc you control -> Ready this ally. It heals all damage from itself.
flavour: Seems to me like we could use a feeding frenzy. - Gaxtro, Bligewater Marksman

name: Clamps
rules: 2, [Exhaust] -> Exhaust up to two target allies.
flavour: Hold those blasted murlocks still! - Gaxtro, Bligewater Marksman

name: Monstrous Mark
rules: Attach to target opposing hero or ally.;Ongoing: Monster heroes and allies you control have Assault 2 while in combat with attached character.;When this ability is destroyed, its owner may put it from his graveyard into his hand.
flavour: I've got you now! - Master Sniper Simon McKey

name: Roar of the Beast
rules: Target Monster ally has + 3 ATK this turn. Target non-Monster ally has -3 ATK this turn.

name: Track Enemy
rules: Attach to target hero or ally you control, then Delve.;Ongoing: When attached character deals damage to an opposing hero, Delve. (Look at the top two cards of your deck. Put any number of them on top of your deck in any order, and the rest on the bottom.)

name: Glacial Tomb
rules: Attach to target ally.;Ongoing: Attached ally can't attack or exhaust.
flavour: Don't worry about him - he'sss on iccce. - Lady Sira'kess

name: Molten Scorch
rules: Your hero deals 3 fire damage to target hero or ally.;Delve (Look at the top two cards of your deck. Put any number of them on top of your deck in any order, and the rest on the bottom.)
flavour: If you can't stand the heat... - Drazul the Molten

name: Monstrous Frostbolt Volley
rules: Target Monster hero or ally you control deals frost damage equal to its ATK to each opposing hero and ally.
flavour: You will not sssurvive the frozen fitire that awaitsss you! - Lady Sira'kess

name: Touch of Brilliance
rules: Attach to target ally you control.;Ongoing: When attached ally deals combat damage to an opposing hero, draw a card.
flavour: It will make you smarter, lad, trust me. - High Magus Olvek

name: Vortex
rules: Monster allies in your hand are instant this turn until you play a Monster ally.
flavour: Ssstrike them down! - Lady Sira'kess

name: Blessing of the Light
rules: Attach to target ally you control.;Ongoing: Attached ally has +1 / +1.;When attached ally deals damage to an opposing hero, it also heals that much damage from your hero.

name: Blessing of the Righteous
rules: Attach to target ally you control.;Ongoing: Attached ally has +3 / +3 and Protector.;When attached ally is destroyed, it heals 6 damage from your hero.

name: Hammer of the Zealot
rules: Exhaust target ally. Draw a card.
flavour: You won't escape that easily. - Rohashu, Zealot of the Sun

name: Righteous Cleanse
rules: Destroy target ability.;Delve (Look at the top two cards of your deck. Put any number of them on top of your deck in any order, and the rest on the bottom.)

name: Power Word: Purity
rules: Attach to target ally, and your hero heals all damage from it.;Ongoing: Attached ally has +2 [Health] and Mend 2. (At the start of your turn, it may heal 2 damage from target hero or ally.)
flavour: Keep your focus; the Light will support you. - Tinker Priest Cassie

name: Power Word: Vitality
rules: Attach to target ally you control.;Ongoing: Attached allt has +3 [Health].

name: Tendrils of Darkness
rules: Your hero deals 5 shadow damage to target ally. When that ally is destroyed this turn, its controller discards a card.
flavour: What lies in the shadows? Test me, and you will surely find out. - High Priestess Neeri

name: Disorienting Blow
rules: Exhaust target hero or ally. It can't ready during its controller's next ready step.; Delve (Look at the top two cards of your deck. Put any number of them on top of your deck in any order, and the rest on the bottom.)

name: Distraction Technique
rules: Ongoing: When an ally or equipment enters play under your control, your hero has Assault 1 this turn, and you may exhaust target hero or ally.
flavour: I've got a few tricks up my sleeve, don't you worry. - Sana the Black Blade

name: Seeping Poison
rules: Attach to target hero or ally that was dealt combat damage by your hero this turn.;Ongoing: At the start of your turn, your hero deals 1 nature damage to attached character. Then, look at the top card of its controller's deck.

name: Boundless Life
rules: Eternal (When this enters your graveyard from anywhere, you may shuffle it into your deck.);your hero heals 1 damage from itself and each ally you control for each resource you control.
flavour: You are under the unflinching watch of the spirits. - Janvaru the Thunderspeaker

name: Lava Shock
rules: Your hero deals 4 fire damage to target ally.;Delve (Look at the top two cards of your deck. Put any number of them on top of your deck in any order, and the rest on the bottom.)

name: Shock of the Elements
rules: As an additional cost to play this ability, you may exhaust two allies you control.;Your hero deals 2 nature damage to target hero or ally, or 6 if you paid the additional cost.

name: Windguard Totem
rules: Ongoing: At the start of each opponent's turn, you may ready all allies you control.;(Totems can't attack.)
flavour: The winds blow in our favor this day. - Samaku, Hand of the Tempest

name: Fel Summon
rules: Delve (Look at the top two cards of your deck. Put any number of them on top of your deck in any order, and the rest on the bottom.);Reveal the top two cards of your deck. Put all revealed allies into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your deck.

name: Grimnar
rules: Protector (This ally may exhaust to become the defender when an opposing hero or ally attacks.);This ally has +1 / +1 for each ally in your graveyard.
flavour: It will be done.

name: Nether Balance
rules: Ongoing: When this ability enter play, your hero deals 5 shadow damage to target ally.;When an opposing ally is destroyed, you may pay 2. If you do, put a 2 [Shadow] / 2 [Health] Demon Skull Monster ally token into play.
flavour: Take what joo need and get rid of da rest. - Voidbringer Jindal'an

name: Soul Cleave
rules: As an additional cost to play this ability, destroy an ally you control.;Destroy up to two target allies.
flavour: Very few things in life and death are fair. - Skodis the Nethertwister

name: Armsman
rules: Ongoing: Your hero has Assault 1 for each armor and item you control.
flavour: Just keep piling it on. - Steelguard Adamson

name: Furious Strike
rules: Your hero has +3 ATK this combat.;Delve (Look at the top two cards of your deck. Put any number of them on top of your deck in any order, and the rest on the bottom.)

name: Monstrous Cleave
rules: Target up to two allies. Your hero deals 4 melee damage to the first target. If you control two or more Monster heroes and/or allies, your hero deals 4 melee damage to the second target.

name: Rallying Swarm
rules: Ongoing: If an equipment entered play under your control this turn: [Exhaust] -> Search your deck for an Unlimited Murloc and put it into play.
flavour: Charge! - Steelguard Adamson

name: Monstrous Strike
rules: Target hero or ally has +1 ATK this turn, or +4 ATK if it's a Monster.
flavour: I will sever your body from your soul with one swing of my blade. - Deathbringer Kor'ush

name: Unleash the Swarm!
rules: Reveal the top seven cards of your deck. Put all revealed Murloc allies with cost 1 or less into play and the rest on the bottom of your deck.
flavour: It never ends... They just keep coming... - High Magus Olvek

name: Face of Fear
rules: Put target ally into its owner's hand.
flavour: Stand before it, if you dare. - Skodis the Nethertwister

name: Rallying Cry of the Dragonslayer
rules: Attach to target ally.;Ongoing: Attached ally has +1 / +1.

name: Strength of Will
rules: Attach to target ally.;Ongoing: Attached ally has +2 / +2.

name: Arcanomage Misti
rules: When this ally deals damage to an opposing hero, draw that many cards.
flavour: You can never have too much mana.

name: Ardon Almastor
rules: When this ally enters play, he deals 2 shadow damage to target ally you control.

name: Balrak Stoutstone
rules: This ally can protect other allies.
flavour: I ain't goin' down that easy, lad.

name: Braeo Darkpaw
rules: This ally has +2 / +2 for each attachment attached to him.

name: Dastrin Bowman
rules: Pets you control have Long-Range. (When they attack, defenders deal no combat damage to them.)

name: Davius, Herald of Nature
rules: Empower Druid: When this ally enters play, if you control another Druid hero or ally, reveal the top card of your deck. You may place it into your resource row exhausted as an additional resource.

name: Dradam Chillblade
rules: Protector (This ally may exhaust to become the defender when an opposing hero or ally attacks.)

name: Evaax, Herald of Death
rules: Empower Death Knight: When this ally enters play, if you control another Death Knight hero or ally, destroy target opposing ally.
flavour: You have lived a good life, but now it's time to move on.

name: Faenis the Tranquil
rules: At the end of your turn, this ally heals 1 damage from each hero and ally you control for each ally you control.
flavour: Do you hear the whispers of nature?

name: Fumdol Mountainfrost
rules: When this ally enters play, Delve (Look at the top two cards of your deck. Put any number of them on top of your deck in any order, and the rest on the bottom.)

name: Funken Fusemissile
rules: When this ally enters play, youmay put another ally you control into its owner's hand.
flavour: Step back and watch me work!

name: Grumdak, Herald of the Hunt
rules: Empower Hunter: When this ally enters play, if you control another Hunter hero or ally, this ally has +2 ATK, Ferocity, and Long-Range this turn.

name: Hadrack the Devoted
rules: If this ally would be dealt damage, prevent all but 1 of it.
flavour: There is true virtue in constancy.

name: Jaema, Herald of the Light
rules: Empower Paladin: When this ally enters play, if you control another Paladin hero or ally, this ally heals 4 damage from target hero or ally, and you draw a card.

name: Kaelon, Herald of the Flame
rules: Empower Mage: When this ally enters play, if you control another Mage hero or ally, this ally deals 5 fire damage to target hero.
flavour: Don't get too close, unless you, too, desire to burn.

name: Larrisa Valorshield
rules: Protector

name: Lodur, Herald of the Elements
rules: Empower Shaman: When this ally enters play, if you control another Shaman hero or ally, target opposing ally becomes 1 / 1 and is also a Frog this turn.
flavour: Quit yer squirmin'!

name: Malar Silverfrost
rules: Protector;When this ally enters play, opposing allies have -1 [Health] this turn.

name: Maloc, Herald of Trickery
rules: Empower Rogue: When this ally enters play, if you control another Rogue hero or ally, gain control of target opposing equipment.

name: Militia Commander Balor
rules: This ally can protect Peasants.;At the start of your turn, you may put two 1 [Melee] / 1 [Health] Peasant ally tokens into play.;Peasants you control can be exhausted to pay costs as though they were resources.

name: Sebastian Malak
rules: This ally has +2 ATK while in combat with a Monster.
flavour: I'll show you the meaning of monstrous.

name: Shaylith Swiftblade
rules: Elusive

name: Tallie Sprinklelight
rules: Mend 1

name: Trista, Herald of the Fel
rules: Empower Warlock: When this ally enters play, if you control another Warlock hero or ally, search your deck for a Pet or Demon ally, reveal it, and put it into your hand.

name: Vaakia
rules: When this ally attacks, she deals 1 fire damage to target hero.
flavour: I will tend to the flame and see that it never dies.

name: Valak the Vortex
rules: When this ally attacks, you may discard an ability. If you do, he deals arcane damage to target ally equal to the cost of that ability.

name: Vindicator Saaris
rules: When this ally enters play, each opponent destroys equipment he controls until he controls only one.
flavour: Shatter their weapons, and you shatter their hope.

name: Wuzlo Grindergear
rules: Weapons you control have Assault 2.
flavour: See what you can do with a little gnomish ingenuity?

name: Xuurvis
rules: When 1 or more damage is healed from this ally, you may draw a card.

name: Zintix the Frostbringer
rules: When this ally deals damage to an opposing hero, you may search your deck for an attachment and play it immediately targeting that hero, without paying its cost.

name: Akasi, Herald of Nature
rules: Empower Druid: When this ally enters play, if you control another Druid hero or ally, reveal the top 5 cards of your deck. Put all revealed attachments into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your deck.
flavour: I hear da call of da wild.

name: Alethia Brightsong
rules: When this ally enter play, Delve (Look at the top two cards of your deck. Put any number of them on top of your deck in any order, and the rest on the bottom.)

name: Amano, Herald of the Sun
rules: Empower Paladin: When this ally enters play, if you control another Paladin hero or ally, each ally you control with cost 2 or less has +X ATK this turn, where X is its ATK.;(received errata)
flavour: The sun provides warmth to all of the Earthmother's children.

name: Anastina, Herald of the Fel
rules: Empower Warlock: When this ally enters play, if you control another Warlock hero or ally, this ally deals 2 shadow damage to each opposing hero and ally.
flavour: Your souls will be put to good use.

name: Asoren Darksnout
rules: Protector

name: Daroka Venomfist
rules: When this ally attacks, exhaust target opposing ally. (A protector exhausted this way can't protect this combat.)
flavour: Cut to the chase.

name: Draga'zal
flavour: Warchief Hellscream is twice the leader Thrakk ever was.

name: Eralysa Sunshot
rules: When this ally enters play, she deals 2 ranged damage to target opposing Monster hero or ally.
flavour: I've picked up its trail. I guarantee it won't escape this time.

name: Hagtrix the Mindsifter
rules: At the start of your turn, each opponent discards a card.;When an opponent discards a card, this ally heals damage from your hero equal to that card's cost.

name: Izzy Quizfiz
rules: 2 -> Ready this ally.

name: Jagrok, Herald of Trickery
rules: Empower Rogue: When this ally enters play, if you control another Rogue hero or ally, you may destroy target exhausted ally.
flavour: This is just too easy.

name: Jaron, Herald of the Hunt
rules: Empower Hunter: When this ally enters play, if you control another Hunter hero or ally, destroy target attacking ally.
flavour: Lead them right into my trap.

name: Jex'ali
rules: When this ally enters play, she heals 4 damage from your hero. Then, if your hero is undamaged, you may draw a card.

name: Jumahko Thundersky
rules: Protector

name: Kalam'ti
rules: When this ally enters play, he deals 3 fire damage to each opposing hero and ally that was dealt damage this turn.

name: Kazbaz
rules: Protector;Elusive
flavour: Don't mess with me, kid. I'm not in the mood.

name: Kelena Ashford
rules: When this ally enters play, if you control a Demon or a Pet, she deals 4 fire damage to target hero.

name: Krezza the Explosive
rules: When this ally deals damage to an opposing hero, she also deals 2 arcane damage to target opposing ally.
flavour: Arcane powers bend to the will of the user.

name: Kromdar, Herald of War
rules: Empower Warrior: When this ally enters play, if you control another Warrior hero or ally, you may destroy target damaged ally.
flavour: Cower in fear before the Horde!

name: Moro Wildmesa
rules: When this ally enters play, target ally has +3 ATK this turn.

name: Nazuk Darkblood
rules: 2 -> This ally has Ferocity this turn.
flavour: The whispers of the Nether have become a scream.

name: Parexia, Herald of the Shadows
rules: Empower Priest: When this ally enters play, if you control another Priest hero or ally, target opponent discards two random cards.

name: Prazo Whiptrick
rules: You pay 3 less to play this ally if you played an equipment this turn.

name: Runzik Shrapnelwhiz
rules: When this ally enters play, he deals 1 ranged damage to target opposing ally.

name: Samantha Galvington
flavour: I have no time for your foolishness.

name: Shala'zum
rules: Protector

name: Treespeaker Onaha
rules: When damage is healed from this ally, put that many 1 [Melee] / 1 [Health] Treant tokens into play.
flavour: I am forever linked with the spirit of the forest.

name: Vol'jin, Darkspear Chieftain
rules: At the end of your turn, target opposing [Alliance] or Monster ally becomes 1/1, loses and can't have powers, and is also a Frog until it leaves play (even if Vol'jin leaves play).
flavour: Here come da voodoo!

name: Vuza'jin
rules: 2 -> Token allies you control have +1 ATK this turn.

name: Yana'mi
rules: When you attach an ability to a hero or ally, draw a card.
flavour: Dis betta be worth it, mon.

name: Zarixx, Herald of Death
rules: Empower Death Knight: When this ally enters play, if you control another Death Knight hero or ally, put a 3 [Melee] / 3 [Health] Ghoul ally token into play, and token allies you control have +1 ATK and Ferocity this turn.

name: Zizzlix Drizzledrill
rules: Opponents can't target this ally.
flavour: The odds are in my favor.

name: Zudzo, Herald of the Elements
rules: Empower Shaman: When this ally enters play, if you control another Shaman hero or ally, this ally deals 3 nature damage to target hero or ally and heals 3 damage from a second target hero or ally.

name: Gilblin Bully
rules: Protector

name: Gilblin Hoarder
rules: [Exhaust] -> Put target equipment you control into its owner's hand.
flavour: Gilgoblins are the result of one of the many experiments of Hobart Grapplehammer.

name: Gilblin Plunderer
rules: Empower Monster: When this ally enters play, if you control another Monster hero or ally, you may destroy target equipment

name: Gilblin Trickster
rules: When an equipment enters play under your control, Delve (Look at the top two cards of your deck. Put any number of them on top of your deck in any order, and the rest on the bottom.)

name: Bobbler
rules: This and other Murloc allies you control have Assault 2.
flavour: Rr mgg Gggmlmmm Lgmlmgl m Mrrrlrml.

name: Brighteye
rules: When this or another Murloc ally enters play under your control, this ally heals 3 damage from target hero or ally.
flavour: Rr mgg Gggmlmmm Lgmlmgl m Ggmgl.

name: Slippyfist
rules: This and other Murloc allies you control have Elusive while ready.
flavour: Lmmmlgml Mmgrrmrm Lmrrlrmm.

name: Snurky
rules: This and other Murloc allies you control have Stealth.
flavour: Mlmmmlm Gmmmmlm Glmrrr.

name: Drugush the Crusher
flavour: Come here, little thing, so I can smash you.

name: Zor'chal the Shadowseer
rules: Enrage (As this ally enters play, you may reveal the top card of your deck.);When you reveal an ally this way, this ally has +2 ATK and Ferocity this turn.

name: Deep Subjugator
rules: Elusive;This ally has +2 / +2 while you control another Merciless One.

name: Idra'kess Mistress
rules: When this ally attacks, she deals 1 frost damage to each [Horde] and [Alliance] hero and ally.

name: Naz'jar Harpooner
rules: When this ally enters play, Delve (Look at the top two cards of your deck. Put any number of them on top of your deck in any order, and the rest on the bottom.)

name: Naz'jar Myrmidon
rules: Protector

name: Naz'jar Sorceress
rules: [Exhaust] -> Target ally can't attack this turn.
flavour: I will freezzze the blood in your veinssss!

name: Sira'kess Tide Priestess
rules: Empower Monster: When this ally enters play, if you control another Monster hero or ally, you may put target ally from your graveyard into your hand.

name: Servant of Neptulon
rules: Elusive;[Exhaust] -> You pay 1 less to play your next Frost or [Frost] card this turn. (A [Frost] card is one with [Frost] in its lower-left corner.)

name: Wasteland Tallstrider
rules: Ferocity;When this ally attacks, you may reveal the top card of your deck. If you revealed a quest or location this way, this and other allies you control have +2 ATK and Ferocity this turn.

name: Bloat the Bubble Fish
rules: Elusive;1 -> This ally has +1 ATK this turn.
flavour: Oomp. There I go. A little help over here?

name: Periwinkle Cloak
rules: On your turn: 2, [Exhaust] -> Choose one: Each player discards a card, or each player draws a card.

name: Shroud of Cooperation
rules: As this armor enters play, choose a class.;On your turn: 2, [Exhaust] -> Put a 1 [Melee] / 1 [Health] ally token of the chosen class into play.

name: Triton Legplates
rules: At the end of each opponent's turn, if your hero was not dealt damage this turn, you may add a triton counter to this armor.;On your turn: [Exhaust], Remove five triton counters from this armor -> Your hero has Assault 10, and the combat damage that it would deal is unpreventable this turn.

name: Wentletrap Vest
flavour: Be sure not to waste the gifts that Tidehunter has bestowed on you. - Erunak Stonespeaker

name: Blessing of the Old God
rules: When this item enters play, draw a card.;[Exhaust], Name a class and destroy this item -> Target ally you control has that class and loses all other classes this turn.

name: Bottled Cunning
rules: When this item enters play, target hero or ally has +2 ATK and Stealth this turn.;On your turn: Exhaust a Rogue hero or ally you control and destroy this item -> Target hero or ally has +2 ATK and Stealth this turn.

name: Bottled Death
rules: When this item enters play, target ally has -2 [Health] this turn.;On your turn: Exhaust a Death Knight hero or ally you control and destroy this item -> Target ally has -2 [Health] this turn.

name: Bottled Elements
rules: When this item enters play, ready target hero or ally.;On your turn: Exhaust a Shaman Hero or ally you control and destroy this item -> Ready target hero or ally.

name: Bottled Knowledge
rules: When this item enter play, draw two cards, then discard a card.;On your turn: Exhaust a Mage hero or ally you control and destroy this item -> Draw two cards, then discard a card.

name: Bottled Light
rules: When this item enters play, put target ally with cost 2 or less from your graveyard into play.;On your turn: Exhaust a Paladin hero or ally you control and destroy this item -> Put target ally with cost 2 or less from your graveyard into play.

name: Bottled Mind
rules: When this item enters play, target opponent discards a card.;On your turn: Exhaust a Priest hero or ally you control and destroy this item -> Target opponent discard a card.

name: Bottled Rage
rules: When this item enters play, your hero and allies you control have +1 ATK this turn.;On your turn: Exhaust a Warrior hero or ally you control and destroy this item ->Your hero and allies you control have +1 ATK this turn.

name: Bottled Spite
rules: When this item enters play, your hero deals 1 nature damage to each opposing hero and ally.;On your turn: Exhaust a Monster hero or ally you control and destroy this item -> Your hero deals 1 nature damage to each opposing hero and ally.

name: Bottled Void
rules: When this item enters play, your hero deals 3 shadow damage to target opposing hero and heals 1 damage from itself for each damage dealt this way.;On your turn: Exhaust a Warlock hero or ally you control and destroy this item -> Your hero deals 3 shadow damage to target opposing hero and heals 1 damage from itself for each damage dealt this way.

name: Bottled Wild
rules: When this item enters play, target hero or ally has Long-Ronge this turn.;On your turn: Exhaust a Hunter hero or ally you control and destroy this item -> Target hero or ally has Long-Ronge this turn.

name: Nautilus Ring
rules: You have no maximum hand size.;At the start of your turn, your hero heals damage from itself equal to the number of cards in your hand.

name: Ring of the Great Whale
rules: If damage would be healed from a hero or ally you control, that much +2 is healed instead.
flavour: A prized treasure dropped by those treacherous intruders. - Erunak Stonespeaker

name: Severed Visionary Tentacle
rules: When this item enters play, remove the top three cards of target opponent's deck from the game face down.;You may look at the cards removed this way at any time.;When an opponent plays a card or places a resource face up into his resource row, you may reveal a card removed this way. If they share a name, destroy this item. If you do, your hero deals 10 shadow damage to that opponent's hero.

name: Throwing Starfish
rules: At the start of your turn, you may add a starfish counter to this item.;2, Remove a starfish counter from this item -> your hero deals 1 melee damage to target hero or ally

name: Breathstone-Infused Longbow
rules: Long-Range;You pay 2 less to play allies with cost 6 or more.

name: Cerith Spire Staff
rules: If your hero would deal any type of damage, it deals frost damage instead.;At the end of your turn, your hero deals 10 fost damage to target opposing hero that was dealt 10 or more frost ([Frost]) damage this turn.

name: Dawnblaze Blade
rules: At the start of your turn, you may add a +1 ATK counter to this weapon.
flavour: If this doesn't get the job done for you, then I don't know what will. - Magatha Silverton

name: Dirk's Command
rules: This weapon has +2 ATK while your hero is attacking a damaged hero or ally.

name: Downfall Hammer
rules: When you strike with this weapon, you may exhaust target hero or ally.

name: Eel Cutter
rules: 1, [Exhaust] -> Allies you control have Assault 1 this turn.
flavour: Those eels ate my brother. It's time someone showed 'em who's boss. - Humphrey Digsong

name: Lightning Whelk Axe
flavour: Each strike unleashes a torrent! - Samaku, Hand of the Tempest

name: Potentate's Letter Opener
rules: On your turn: 3, [Exhaust], Exhaust your hero -> Your hero deals 2 fire damage to target hero or ally.
flavour: This seems a bit excessive for a simple letter opener... - Tinker Priest Cassie

name: Throat Slasher
rules: Your hero has Dual Wield.; This weapon has +1 ATK while your hero is attacking an exhausted hero or ally.

name: The Culmination of Our Efforts
rules: Pay 4 to complete this quest.;Reward: Choose ability, ally, equipment, or quest and reveal the top five cards of your deck. Put a revealed card of the chosen type into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your deck.
flavour: Victory is only a matter of time. - Lady Naz'jar

name: The Last Living Lorekeeper
rules: On your turn: Pay 5 to complete this quest.;Reward: your hero heals 3 damage from itself. Draw a card
flavour: I... have not yet... perished. - Nordu

name: Reoccupation
rules: On your turn: Pay 2 to complete this quest.;Reward: Shuffle your graveyard into your deck, then remove all cards in each opponent's graveyard from the game.
flavour: Hah! It seems you were right. That broken trident is serving you just fine. - Fathom-Stalker Azjentus

name: Rescue the Earthspeaker!
rules: If you have no cards in your hand: Pay 2 to complete this quest.;Reward: Draw a card.
flavour: You must hurry if we are to rescue Erunak. - Captain Taylor

name: Seeds of Their Demise
rules: Pay 0 to complete this quest.;Reward: Delve (Look at the top two cards of your deck. Put any number of them on top of your deck in any order, and the rest on the bottom.)
flavour: I need you to harvest some bileberries from the wailing weeds that surround this tower. - Tyrus Blackhorn

name: Setting an Example
rules: On your turn, if there are three or more allies in your graveyard: Pay 2 to complete this quest.;Reward: Draw a card.
flavour: If your ladyship has the time, bring a high-shaman to my feet that I might deliver this message to him and his people. - Executioner Verathress

name: Wake of Destruction
rules: If you control two or more Monster heroes and/or allies: Pay 2 to complete this quest.;Reward: Draw a card.
flavour: Use this orb to subdue them, then direct them against our enemy. - Erunak Stonespeaker

name: Waking the Beast
rules: Pay 1 to complete this quest.;Reward: Reveal the top card of your deck. If it's a Monster ally, put it into your hand, Otherwise, leave it on top of your deck,
flavour: Make yourself ready... I will now tell Nespirah to begin the countdown. - Earthmender Duarn

name: Waters of Elune
rules: Om your turn: Pay 4 to complete this quest.;Reward: Draw a card.
flavour: The water glows like moonlight and hums with soft tones.

name: Bloat the Bubble Fish
rules: Elusive;1 -> This ally has +1 ATK this turn.
flavour: Oomp. There I go. A little help over here?

name: Throwing Starfish
rules: At the start of your turn, you may add a starfish counter to this item.;2, Remove a starfish counter from this item -> your hero deals 1 melee damage to target hero or ally

name: Wasteland Tallstrider
rules: Ferocity;When this ally attacks, you may reveal the top card of your deck. If you revealed a quest or location this way, this and other allies you control have +2 ATK and Ferocity this turn.

name: Gnash
rules: When Gnash enters play, destroy all allies with cost 3 or less.
flavour: Tiny little things, leave Gnash alone!
